relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and are close friends.
The Weasley family is friends with Harry Potter.
Ginny is a member of the Weasley family.
Bill is the son of Mr. Weasley.
Mrs. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family.
Percy is the son of Mr. Weasley.
Ron and Harry are close friends.
Harry, Hermione, and the Weasleys have the run of Gryffindor Tower.
